Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\debug\LogTarget

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\debug\LogTarget » yii\log\Target » yii\base\Component » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
The debug LogTarget is used to store logs for later use in the debugger tool

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$enabled boolean Whether to enable this log target yii\log\Target
$categories array List of message categories that this target is interested in yii\log\Target
$except array List of message categories that this target is NOT interested in yii\log\Target
$logUser boolean Whether to log a message containing the current user name and ID yii\log\Target
$logVars array List of the PHP predefined variables that should be logged in a message yii\log\Target
$exportInterval integer How many messages should be accumulated before they are exported yii\log\Target
$messages array The messages that are retrieved from the logger so far by this log target yii\log\Target
$module yii\debug\Module yii\debug\LogTarget
$tag yii\debug\LogTarget
$behaviors yii\base\Behavior[] list of behaviors attached to this component yii\debug\LogTarget
$levels integer the message levels that this target is interested in yii\debug\LogTarget

Property Details

$module property
yii\debug\Module $module = null

$tag property
$tag = null

$behaviors property read-only
yii\base\Behavior[] getBehaviors( )

list of behaviors attached to this component

$levels property
integer getLevels( )
void setLevels( $levels )

the message levels that this target is interested in. This is a bitmap of level values. Defaults to 0, meaning all available levels.

Method Details

__construct() method
void __construct( $module, $config = [] )
$module yii\debug\Module
$config array

export() method
void export( )

Exports log messages to a specific destination.

Child classes must implement this method.

collect() method
void collect( $messages, $final )
$messages array Log messages to be processed. See \yii\debug\Logger::messages for the structure of each message.
$final boolean Whether this method is called at the end of the current application

Processes the given log messages.

This method will filter the given messages with $levels and $categories. And if requested, it will also export the filtering result to specific medium (e.g. email).

gc() method
void gc( &$manifest )
$manifest

getSqlTotalCount() method
integer getSqlTotalCount( )

Returns total sql count executed in current request. If database panel is not configured returns 0.
